p:
The counts matrix generated using featureCounts was processed in the R statistical software environment (version 3.5) to determine differentially expressed genes for the reported comparisons. The R package RUVseq was used to remove unwanted variation using the RUVr method
24 . DESEQ2 was then used to determine differential gene expression using the likelihood ratio test
25 . Significance was achieved for fdr-adjusted p-value < 0.05 and fold change exceeding 1.5×.
